page.title: 03Clubs (continued)
page.content: DAY CENTRE Provides midday meal & entertainment for retired members of the community every Thursday MSC 10.30am to 3.00pm. Transport provided. FOOTBALL CLUB Meets Haverhill Sports Centre-midweek training\Sat & Sun fixtures throughout the season. Club night Thursday in Greyhound Public House. 25-30 local members: seasonal subscription. GUN CLUB No information available. HAPPY HOURS CLUB Exists for over 60's. Meets socially Sat fortnightly MSC. 70 local members. Annual subscription. HARMONY CLUB (Methodist) 25 local members. Meets in the Chapel Tues afternoon monthly. Ladies only. HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY Meets Mon monthly. WI Hall. 100 local members. Exists to promote interest in gardening. Organizes Annual Flower Show & Carnival.
